scripts.build: poetry run pyinstaller --onefile src/main.py --distpath dist --paths src
scripts.pkg:linux: poetry run pyinstaller --onefile src/main.py --distpath build/linux/ai --name main --paths src --add-data="config.json:config.json"
scripts.pkg:mac: poetry run pyinstaller --onefile src/main.py --distpath build/mac/ai --name main --paths src --add-data="config.json:config.json"
scripts.pkg:win: poetry run pyinstaller --onefile src/main.py --distpath build/windows/ai --name main.exe --paths src --add-data "config.json;config.json"
